column.name: YWLX
column.option: 1|权益;2|固收(发行前);3|债券;4|新三板

column.name: LDSP
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcIB_XYSPB"+"&Ywlx=110000";;
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

column.name: FXBSSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT TSNR FROM ECIF.TIB_XMFXBSXX WHERE YXZT = 1"); ''+i+''

column.name: XMLX
column.option: 0|挂牌;1|一般再融资;2|超200人再融资;3|重大资产重组;4|收购业务;5|承接持续督导;7|持续督导;6|其他类型

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.ID in (select userid from lbmember where orgid=13833 and roleid=7) and tUser.Status = 1",[]]

column.name: XMJBQK_T
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if(1>0){
O_THIS.getColumn("XMJBQK_T").setLabel("项目基本情况");
}
XYLX==2

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: NHBZS
column.default: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select NHBZS from ecif.tIB_LCNHZYZSPZB where LCDM='lcIB_XYSPB' and QYZT=1")

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致、该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XYSPB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_XYSPB&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XYSPB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
